input_email_body:
Subject: 

Dear Customer Support, please address the underperformance of our digital marketing campaigns, which has led to stagnant brand growth despite efforts to optimize keywords and adjust target demographics My name is David Kim.. The root cause might be outdated strategies that are not aligned with our target audience. I would greatly appreciate it if you could provide guidance on how to revamp our approach to get our campaigns back on track You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. Specifically, I would like to know about any new tools that could be useful.
